description:
After watching the Straw Hats’ departure to Onigashima, Tama wondered if there was anything she could do to help the Straw Hats and the samurai. Now that she’s here on Onigashima, it’s time to execute her powerful plan – Operation Kibi Dango!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le plan secret d’O-Tama. Opération Boulette de millet !
Otama no Hisaku! Kibi Dango Daisakusen
Otama`s Secret Plan! Operation Kibi Dango!
Тайный план О-Тамы! Операция Киби Данго!
خطّة أوتاما السّرّيّة! عمليّة الكيبي دانغو
お玉の秘策! きびだんご大作戦
